nodes.bodyText: There's an error on this test. I'm thinking it's because the profile is expecting an MBI, but FHIRExtractors.getPatientMPI() is called, looking for bene_id. So we might need to set both temporarily?
The issue was a bad commit, I pulled in the profile changes by mistake, those will come in a new commit, this is supposed to be just be creating space in the enum.
